comment.author: 46006629@N03
comment._content: For those who care about details, the Florida Memory site has reidentified this as the interior of a Sikorsky S-42, which was a few years newer than the S-40, and has re-dated the photo to circa 1934. The windows seem to be the telltale feature--the closely spaced porthole-shaped windows here are distinctive to the S-42. Most of the S-40's windows were rectangular, and those that were porthole-shaped were spaced much more widely.

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/46006629@N03] Thanks for reminding us - I've updated this record as well.
